fixes.name: Risk Currency
fixes.dax_expression:
SWITCH(
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Title],
    "Major CAD", "CAD",
    "Major USD", "USD",
    "Major EUR", "EUR",
    "Major GBP", "GBP",
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau CASE expression to a DAX SWITCH that compares the row-level 'Market Title' column to each value. All column references use the 'TableName'[Column] format and unmatched cases return BLANK().
